00091 VL_INLINE void
00092 vl_heap_swap (VlHeap * self, void * a, void * b)
00093 {
00094   if (self->swapFunction == NULL) {
00095 
00096     char * ac = a ;
00097     char * bc = b ;
00098     char * end = ac + self->nodeSize ;
00099     char * endg = end - sizeof(int) + 1 ;
00100 
00101     while (ac < endg) {
00102       int t = ((int*)ac)[0] ;
00103       ((int*)ac)[0] = ((int*)bc)[0]  ;
00104       ((int*)bc)[0] = t ;
00105       ac += 4 ;
00106       bc += 4 ;
00107     }
00108     while (ac < end) {
00109       char t = *ac ;
00110       *ac++ = *bc ;
00111       *bc++ = t ;
00112     }
00113   } else {
00114     (self->swapFunction)(self->swapFunctionCustomData, a, b) ;
00115   }
00116 }
00117 
00132 VL_EXPORT void
00133 vl_heap_set_swap_func (VlHeap *self,
00134                        void (*swap)(void * custom , void * a, void * b),
00135                        void * customData)
00136 {
00137   self->swapFunction = swap ;
00138   self->swapFunctionCustomData = customData ;
00139 }
00140 
00150 VL_EXPORT VlHeap * vl_heap_new
00151 (void * nodes, int nodeSize, int (*compare)(void const * a, void const * b))
00152 {
00153   VlHeap * self = vl_malloc (sizeof(VlHeap)) ;
00154   self->nodeSize = nodeSize ;
00155   self->numNodes = 0 ;
00156   self->nodes = nodes ;
00157   self->tempNode = vl_malloc (nodeSize) ;
00158   self->compareFunction = compare ;
00159   self->swapFunction = 0 ;/*vl_heap_standard_swap ;*/
00160   self->swapFunctionCustomData = 0 ;
00161   return self ;
00162 }
00163 
00169 VL_EXPORT void
00170 vl_heap_delete (VlHeap * self)
00171 {
00172   if (self->tempNode) vl_free (self->tempNode) ;
00173   vl_free (self) ;
00174 }

00183 VL_EXPORT void
00184 vl_heap_down (VlHeap* self, int nodeIndex)
00185 {
00186   void * node ;
00187   void * parent ;
00188   int unsigned parentIndex ;
00189   int sign ;
00190 
00191   if (nodeIndex == 0) return  ;
00192   parentIndex = vl_heap_parent (nodeIndex) ;
00193 
00194   node   = vl_heap_get_node_with_index (self, nodeIndex) ;
00195   parent = vl_heap_get_node_with_index (self, parentIndex) ;
00196 
00197   sign = (self->compareFunction)(node, parent) ;
00198 
00199   if (sign < 0) {
00200     vl_heap_swap(self, node, parent) ;
00201     vl_heap_down (self, parentIndex) ;
00202   }
00203 }
00204 
00212 VL_EXPORT void
00213 vl_heap_up (VlHeap * self, int nodeIndex)
00214 {
00215   int leftIndex  = vl_heap_left_child  (nodeIndex) ;
00216   int rightIndex = vl_heap_right_child (nodeIndex) ;
00217 
00218   void * node  = vl_heap_get_node_with_index (self, nodeIndex) ;
00219   void * left  = vl_heap_get_node_with_index (self, leftIndex) ;
00220   void * right = vl_heap_get_node_with_index (self, rightIndex) ;
00221 
00222   /* no childer: stop */
00223   if (leftIndex >= self->numNodes) return ;
00224 
00225   /* only left childer: easy */
00226   if (rightIndex >= self->numNodes) {
00227     int sign = (self->compareFunction)(node, left) ;
00228     if (sign > 0) {
00229       vl_heap_swap (self, node, left) ;
00230     }
00231     return ;
00232   }
00233 
00234   /* both childern */
00235   {
00236     int sign = (self->compareFunction)(left, right) ;
00237     if (sign < 0) {
00238       /* swap with left */
00239       sign = (self->compareFunction)(node, left) ;
00240       if (sign > 0) {
00241         vl_heap_swap(self, node, left) ;
00242         vl_heap_up (self, leftIndex) ;
00243       }
00244     } else {
00245       /* swap with right */
00246       sign = (self->compareFunction)(node, right) ;
00247       if (sign > 0) {
00248         vl_heap_swap(self, node, right) ;
00249         vl_heap_up (self, rightIndex) ;
00250       }
00251     }
00252   }
00253 }
00254 
00271 VL_EXPORT void
00272 vl_heap_push (VlHeap * self)
00273 {
00274   self->numNodes += 1 ;
00275   vl_heap_down (self, self->numNodes - 1) ;
00276 }
00277 
00295 VL_EXPORT void *
00296 vl_heap_pop (VlHeap * self)
00297 {
00298   void * root ;
00299   void * last ;
00300   if (self->numNodes == 0) return NULL ;
00301   root = vl_heap_get_node_with_index (self, 0) ;
00302   last = vl_heap_get_node_with_index (self, self->numNodes - 1) ;
00303   vl_heap_swap(self, root, last) ;
00304   self->numNodes -= 1 ;
00305   if (self->numNodes > 1) {
00306     vl_heap_up (self, 0) ;
00307   }
00308   return last ;
00309 }
00310 
00329 VL_EXPORT void
00330 vl_heap_update (VlHeap * self, int unsigned nodeIndex)
00331 {
00332   vl_heap_up (self, nodeIndex) ;
00333   vl_heap_down (self, nodeIndex) ;
00334 }
